title: [Large-Scale] Augmented Reality (AR)-Based Instructional Design Strategies for Secondary Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of AR technology and fundamental smartphone usage skills
context.additional_context: Acquiring AR utilization strategies in social contexts for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields.

learning_goals: Learners can design AR-based educational content by applying the ARCS motivation model.
Learners can develop AR educational scenarios in limited technological environments (smartphone-centric).
Learners can measure the motivational effects of AR education using the IMMS survey tool.

resources: AR development tools (e.g., Unity + AR Foundation)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
